timeline.message:
Dry up Searchable Snapshots ITs

Just a few spots where we can dry up these tests using the snapshot test infrastructure
in core that I found while studying the existing searchable snapshot tests.

timeline.bodyText: We have a static constant FsRepository.TYPE for this why nobody wants to use it? :)
timeline.author: tlrx

replies.bodyText: I don't know :) but it's a good point ... I'll keep it in mind next time I touch this stuff, promise :)
replies.author: original-brownbear
